definition: (medicine) the formation of morbific matter in an abscess or a vesicle and the discharge of pus
details:
noun
- (medicine) the formation of morbific matter in an abscess or a vesicle and the discharge of pus
= synonyms: suppuration
- (biology) the process of an individual organism growing organically
= synonyms: growing
- coming to full development
= synonyms: ripening, maturement
